name: water
description:
The water command extracts rivers, lakes, and other water features from OSM data. It identifies:

- Rivers and streams
- Lakes and ponds
- Canals and waterways
- Coastlines and bays
- Springs and waterfalls

Calculates area for water bodies.

options.-f, --format: Output format: geojson, json, csv (default: geojson)
options.--type: Water feature type: river, lake, stream, canal, coastline, all (default: all)

output:
Water features with:
- water_type: Type of water feature
- name: Feature name
- area_sqm: Area in square meters (for polygons)
- Geometry: Point, LineString, or Polygon
